description:
Let`s Start to Unite Up! This week, we explore the music`s journey of how all the various music was composed through different talented artists. Please enjoy this special program.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kore kara Hajimeru "UniteUp!": Ongaku no Kiseki
Let`s Start to "Unite Up!": The Music`s Journey
これからはじめる「UniteUp!」~音楽のキセキ~
